title: Netherlands woman found dead in an apartment in Wellawatte
content: The body of a 24-year-old woman from Netherlands was discovered last night in an apartment complex in the Wellawatte area, the police said.The victim was identified as Kalidien Nisha Gatoen, a Netherlands national.According to the police, the victim had been having an affair with a Sri Lankan youth who she had met through 'Tik Tok' on social media.
